attributes.action: Create a nation training scheme to train more lgv drivers(lorry drivers) to fill a skill shotage in the uk haulage sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The uk road haulage sector has a skills shortage of trained lgv drivers of all class 
one local firm in my area employs 100 c+e drivers (old class one hgv  artics)
of which 25 are polish this is the case with numerous firm in my area hull and the rest of the country 
(this is not anti polish or such nationitrys)refer back to the firm i mentioned i work there for some time in transport office and the polish drivers came and went and were not a constant force (polish worker come and go staying on average no more than 4 years)I suggest that  uk workers or unemployed people would jump at the chace to become a lgv driver but can't afford the thousand of pounds of tutation
